normal.name: Treasure Trove I
normal.desc: Gain 1 blue and 1 gray loot orb(s).

normal.name: Recombobulator
normal.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions that cost 1 more. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

normal.name: Keepers I
normal.desc: At the start of combat, your units grant adjacent allies a 160 health shield for 8 seconds.

normal.name: Challenger Unity
normal.desc: The Challenger trait grants its bonuses to all of your Champions. This does not increase your number of Challengers. Gain a Quinn.

normal.name: Hextech Armory
normal.desc: The Hextech trait grants its bonuses to all of your Champions. This does not increase your number of Hextech units. Gain a Sejuani.

normal.name: Electrocharge I
normal.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 60-105 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

normal.name: Disintegrator I
normal.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's maximum Health.

normal.name: Luden's Echo I
normal.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 70-130 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

normal.name: Backfoot I
normal.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 20% Attack Speed.

normal.name: Phalanx I
normal.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

normal.name: Battlemage I
normal.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 30 Ability Power.

normal.name: Meditation I
normal.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 5 Mana per second.

normal.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
normal.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 125 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

normal.name: Cybernetic Shell I
normal.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 125 Health and 30 Armor.

normal.name: Second Wind I
normal.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 50% of their missing Health.

normal.name: Double Trouble I
normal.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

normal.name: Tri Force I
normal.desc: Your 3-cost units gain 233 Health, 13 starting Mana, and 13% Attack Speed.

normal.name: Blue Battery I
normal.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

normal.name: True Justice
normal.desc: Your Enforcers deal true damage to enemies below 80% Health. Gain a Sejuani.

normal.name: Irresistible Charm
normal.desc: Debonair champions take 15% less damage. Gain a Leona.

normal.name: Debonair Heart
normal.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Debonair. Gain a Talon.

normal.name: Stored Power
normal.desc: Your Hextech champions permanently gain 1 Ability Power each time they are hit by your Hexcore's pulses. Gain a Swain.

normal.name: Hexnova
normal.desc: The first time a Hextech champion drops below 60% Health, they increase nearby enemies' maximum Mana by 50% until they cast. Gain a Nocturne.

normal.name: Hextech Heart
normal.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Hextech. Gain a Swain.

normal.name: Concussive Blows
normal.desc: Striker's critical strikes stun their target for 1.5 second(s). Each target can only be stunned once every 7 seconds. Gain a Rek'sai.

normal.name: Overpower
normal.desc: After every 2 attacks, Strikers gain 75% Critical Strike Chance on their next attack. Gain a Rek'sai.

normal.name: Striker Heart
normal.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Striker. Gain a Rek'sai.

normal.desc: Bodyguards' Armor bonus is increased by 25%. At the start of combat, Bodyguards grant 100% of their Armor bonus to non-Bodyguard allies directly behind them (does not stack). Gain a Blitzcrank.

normal.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Sejuani.

normal.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mutant. Gain a Rek'Sai.

normal.name: Scholar Heart
normal.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scholar. Gain a Zyra.

normal.name: Lifelong Learning
normal.desc: Scholars permanently gain 2 Ability Power after each combat, and an additional 2 if they survived. Gain a Syndra.

normal.name: Scrap Heart
normal.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scrap. Gain a Blitzcrank.

normal.name: Sniper's Nest
normal.desc: Snipers gain +8% damage for each round fought from the same starting hex. (Maximum +32%). Gain an Ashe.
